alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 4:52AM AKST until December 23 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches, with localized amounts up to 11 inches, are expected. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...6 AM Wednesday to 6 AM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
